content.prompt: Which statement is true about the distances the two object have traveled at time tf?

choices.label: Object 1 has traveled a greater distance.
Object 2 has traveled a greater distance.
Both objects have traveled the same distance.
The total distance traveled by each object cannot be compared using the graph.

topic.text: 1.1: Scalars and Vectors in One Dimension

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
